PackageOracle.name: DA_COMMUNITY
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_COMMUNITY
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.45.704428000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,community_nm IN VARCHAR2
,community_county_nm IN VARCHAR2
,community_state_cd IN VARCHAR2
,franchise_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,community_nm IN VARCHAR2
,community_county_nm IN VARCHAR2
,community_state_cd IN VARCHAR2
,franchise_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,community_id IN NUMBER
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,community_nm IN VARCHAR2
,community_county_nm IN VARCHAR2
,community_state_cd IN VARCHAR2
,franchise_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,community_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_community;

body.name: DA_COMMUNITY
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_COMMUNITY
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.45.721053000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,community_nm IN VARCHAR2
,community_county_nm IN VARCHAR2
,community_state_cd IN VARCHAR2
,franchise_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_community.add(fx), parms=' || headend_id || '|' || community_nm || '|' || community_county_nm || '|' || community_state_cd || '|' || franchise_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_community a
(
a.community_id
,a.headend_id
,a.community_nm
,a.community_county_nm
,a.community_state_cd
,a.franchise_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_community_id.NEXTVAL
,add.headend_id
,add.community_nm
,add.community_county_nm
,add.community_state_cd
,add.franchise_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.community_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_community.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,community_nm IN VARCHAR2
,community_county_nm IN VARCHAR2
,community_state_cd IN VARCHAR2
,franchise_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_community.add, parms=' || headend_id || '|' || community_nm || '|' || community_county_nm || '|' || community_state_cd || '|' || franchise_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_community a
(
a.community_id
,a.headend_id
,a.community_nm
,a.community_county_nm
,a.community_state_cd
,a.franchise_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_community_id.NEXTVAL
,add.headend_id
,add.community_nm
,add.community_county_nm
,add.community_state_cd
,add.franchise_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_community.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,community_id IN NUMBER
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,community_nm IN VARCHAR2
,community_county_nm IN VARCHAR2
,community_state_cd IN VARCHAR2
,franchise_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_community.add, parms=' || community_id || '|' || headend_id || '|' || community_nm || '|' || community_county_nm || '|' || community_state_cd || '|' || franchise_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_community a
(
a.community_id
,a.headend_id
,a.community_nm
,a.community_county_nm
,a.community_state_cd
,a.franchise_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.community_id
,add.headend_id
,add.community_nm
,add.community_county_nm
,add.community_state_cd
,add.franchise_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_community.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,community_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_community.del, parms=' || community_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_community a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.community_id = del.community_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_community.del');

END del;

END da_community;
